title: Calendar-based invoice generation with bank holiday awareness
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add invoice generation scheduling that calculates when to generate an invoice based on:

1. Invoice due date
2. Minus 'days to pay' (payment terms)  
3. Adjusted for bank holidays of BOTH sender and recipient countries

**Design decisions:**
- Bank holiday data: External API (e.g., Nager.Date API)
- Auto-generation mode: Draft creation (auto-create draft invoice, user reviews/sends)

**Components needed:**
- Bank holiday service (fetch from external API, cache locally)
- Working day calculator (skip weekends + holidays)
- Invoice generation scheduler model
- Configuration: payment terms per company, sender/recipient country
- Draft invoice creation with notification to user
- UI to review/approve/send draft invoices

This is a proactive generation system (calendar → generate) separate from the existing reactive filing system (file arrives → organize).
